'''Red Wolfhook''' is a Quest Item during [[Barbara]]'s [[Hangout Event]], [[Wellspring of Healing]].

It is a red variant of [[Wolfhook]]s. If the route where the [[Traveler]] hides further into the forest with Barbara to avoid [[Albert]] is chosen during the hangout event, Red Wolfhooks will spawn around the area in Wolvendom to be collected and given to Barbara. If the Traveler confronts Alfred and manages to convince him to leave Wolvendom, Alfred will give the Traveler the Red Wolfhooks he collected.
